LanguageData.AM_PastedFuneral.label: gamer slop funeral
LanguageData.AM_NutrientPasteEating_Indifferent.descr:
Gamer slop is a necessity on the Rim. It may not be tasty but it keeps you well fed for another day.

<color=#E5E54C>Note:</color>
 - This is just a version of the "Don't mind" rank of the precept that doesn't need Transhumanist, so you can add it to other ideos if you want.
LanguageData.AM_NutrientPasteEating_Preferred.descrip: Gamer slop is divine ambrosia. A formless glop made of reprocessed meats, vegetables and... "other things". Who could say no to that?
